body_html:
I'm working on it. I will push to github once I have checked all tests in control_flow_ops_py_test.

Progress:
The graph rewriting algorithm now play nice with while loops. However, optimization does not cross loop or iteration boundary.

TODOs:
Check all tests in control_flow_ops_py_test.
Implement gradient.
Python api improvements (move to contrib, add a drop-in replacement for tf.cond, docs).

body:
I'm working on it. I will push to github once I have checked all tests in `control_flow_ops_py_test`.

Progress:
The graph rewriting algorithm now play nice with while loops. However, optimization does not cross loop or iteration boundary.

TODOs:
Check all tests in `control_flow_ops_py_test`.
Implement gradient.
Python api improvements (move to contrib, add a drop-in replacement for `tf.cond`, docs).
